授業目的: The objective of this course is to allow students the opportunity to earn credits by pursuing themes of their own choice. Students will be required to conduct in depth research and analyses and to submit a report that is the equivalent of a master’s thesis. The instructor will provide individual guidance on selection of research theme, research methodology and research execution. Those students who are interested in the management of innovation will be highly welcomed.
到達目標: In this course, students have the opportunity to earn credits by pursuing themes of their own choice. Students will be required to conduct in depth research and analyses and to submit a report that is the equivalent of a master’s thesis. The instructor will provide individual guidance on selection of research theme, research methodology and research execution. Those students who are interested in the management of innovation will be highly welcomed.
授業方法:
Online Format: Simultaneous and Two-way via Zoom (I'd appreciate if you could follow instructions below).
1. join the session via PC, rather than a smartphone
2. be on time for class, otherwise you may not be able to join smoothly
3. sign-in with your nick-name you prefer to be called (rather than your fullname)
4. turn-on your video to show your face to your classmates
5. use earphones or a headset to make sure that your microphone does not capture sound from your speaker

評価.学生による授業評価の方法Course Evaluation by Student: To be conducted in the last class by using a standard form designated by IBA.
評価.学位授与の方針との関連Relationship to Diploma Polic:
各授業科目は、各学部・研究科の定めるディプロマ・ポリシー（DP）・カリキュラム・ポリシー（CP）に基づき、カリキュラム上に配置されています。
DP・CPを意識して本授業科目の学修を進めることで、各学部・研究科の期待する能力が養成されます。
各学部・研究科のDP、CPや教育課程表（授業科目一覧等）は、下記リンクこちらに掲載していますので学修計画の参考にしてください。
https://kwic.kwansei.ac.jp/cabinet/reference?typeCd=0&cabinetId=557&directLink=1
※kwicへのリンクとなります（在学生のみ閲覧可）
